name: Block Quest: Jewel Puzzle
description:
Fill the various blocks to the empty spaces fully
and blocks will be removed.
Remove as many blocks as possible!

[Features]
- No limit to play such as Heart, play as much as you can!
- No network required
- game file is as low as 15M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports Google Play Leaderboards, Achievement
- supports 14 languages
